Title: AN ACT EXTENDING TO OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES RETIRED UNDER THE PROVISIONS OF ART NUMBERED TWENTY-FIRE HUNDRED AND EIGHTY-NINE THE PRIVILEGES GRANTED BY COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED TWO HUNDRED AND SIX TO OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES RETIRED UNDER ACT NUMBERED FOUR THOUSAND AND FIFTY-ONE.
Data:
[ Commonwealth Act No. 248, December 17, 1937 ]
AN ACT EXTENDING TO OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES RETIRED UNDER THE PROVISIONS OF ART NUMBERED TWENTY-FIRE HUNDRED AND EIGHTY-NINE THE PRIVILEGES GRANTED BY COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED TWO HUNDRED AND SIX TO OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES RETIRED UNDER ACT NUMBERED FOUR THOUSAND AND FIFTY-ONE.
Be it enacted by the National Assembly of the Philippines:
Section 1. The privileges granted by Commonwealth Act Numbered Two hundred and six to persons retired under the provisions of Act Numbered Four thousand and fifty-one of the Philippine Legislature, and reappointed to any position in the Government, are extended to persons retired under the provisions of Act Numbered Twenty-five hundred and eighty-nine of the Philippine Legislature, who are reappointed to any Government position.(aw√ûhi(
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved, .December 17, 1937.
